# Cyberpunk 2077 uevr Configuration
# Generated by uevrInjector.exe baseline profile creation
# REDengine 4 Cross-Engine VR Adapter Configuration

# VR Runtime Configuration
VR_Runtime=OpenXR
VR_ControllersAllowed=true
VR_RoomscaleMovement=true
VR_AimMethod=2
VR_UncapFramerate=true

# Display and Performance
VR_ResolutionScale=1.0
VR_UseCustomResolutionScale=false
VR_CustomResolutionScale=1.0
VR_UseCustomFOV=false
VR_CustomFOV=90.0

# Camera and Movement
VR_UseCustomCameraHeight=false
VR_CustomCameraHeight=0.0
VR_UseCustomCameraOffset=false
VR_CustomCameraOffset_X=0.0
VR_CustomCameraOffset_Y=0.0
VR_CustomCameraOffset_Z=0.0

# Comfort Settings
VR_UseSnapTurn=true
VR_SnapTurnAngle=45.0
VR_UseSmoothTurn=false
VR_SmoothTurnSpeed=1.0
VR_UseDecoupledPitch=true
VR_UseDecoupledYaw=false

# Input Configuration
VR_UseCustomDeadzone=false
VR_CustomDeadzone=0.1
VR_UseCustomSensitivity=false
VR_CustomSensitivity=1.0

# UObjectHook Configuration
UObjectHook_EnabledAtStartup=true
UObjectHook_AutoScan=true
UObjectHook_SaveStateOnExit=true

# REDengine 4 Specific Settings
REDengine4_UseCustomHooks=true
REDengine4_EnableRayTracingVR=true
REDengine4_EnableNeuralUpscaling=true
REDengine4_OptimizeForVR=true

# Performance Optimization
VR_UseAsyncReprojection=true
VR_UseMotionReprojection=false
VR_UseFixedFoveatedRendering=false
VR_UseDynamicResolution=false

# UI and Overlay Settings
VR_ShowFPS=true
VR_ShowPerformanceOverlay=false
VR_ShowDebugInfo=false
VR_ShowControllerInfo=true

# Audio Settings
VR_Use3DAudio=true
VR_UseHRTF=true
VR_AudioVolume=1.0

# Advanced Settings
VR_UseAdvancedOptions=true
VR_EnableDebugMode=false
VR_LogLevel=1

# Profile Information
